title: Windows: File retrieval across dataset boundaries leaves unclean dataset states
body:
I'm essentially following the Findoutmore "On the looks and feels of this published dataset" at the end of [this section](http://handbook.datalad.org/en/latest/basics/101-130-yodaproject.html#publishing-the-dataset-to-github).
It consists of:

- cloning a dataset from github
- getting a file in the subdataset

The file is retrieved successfully, but is left in a modified and symlinked state in the subdataset (staged), and the superdataset subsequently reports a modified subdataset.

```
(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing>datalad clone "https://github.com/adswa/midtermproject.git"
[INFO] Detected a filesystem without fifo support.
[INFO] Disabling ssh connection caching.
[INFO] Detected a crippled filesystem.
[INFO] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)
[INFO] Entering an adjusted branch where files are unlocked as this filesystem does not support locked files.
[INFO] Switched to branch 'adjusted/master(unlocked)'
[INFO] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
install(ok): C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject (dataset)

(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing>cd midtermproject

(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject>cat .gitmodules
[submodule "input"]
        path = input
        url = https://github.com/datalad-handbook/iris_data.git
        datalad-id = 5800e71c-09f9-11ea-98f1-e86a64c8054c

(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject>datalad get input/iris.csv
[INFO] Detected a filesystem without fifo support.
[INFO] Disabling ssh connection caching.
[INFO] Detected a crippled filesystem.
[INFO] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time)
[INFO] Entering an adjusted branch where files are unlocked as this filesystem does not support locked files.
[INFO] Switched to branch 'adjusted/master(unlocked)'
[INFO] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
[INFO] Submodule HEAD got detached. Resetting branch adjusted/master(unlocked) to point to b9eb768c. Original location was 1a21691b
install(ok): C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject\input (dataset) [Installed subdataset in order to get C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject\input\iris.csv]
get(ok): C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject\input\iris.csv (file) [from web...]
action summary:
  get (ok: 1)
  install (ok: 1)

(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject>datalad status -r
 modified: input (dataset)
 modified: input\iris.csv (symlink)

(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject>git -C input status
On branch adjusted/master(unlocked)
Changes to be committed:
  (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage)
        modified:   iris.csv


(base) C:\Users\datalad\testing\midtermproject>git diff
diff --git a/input b/input
--- a/input
+++ b/input
@@ -1 +1 @@
-Subproject commit b9eb768c145e4a253d619d2c8285e540869d2021
+Subproject commit b9eb768c145e4a253d619d2c8285e540869d2021-dirty
```
